summary: Aunt Calliopi returns to Greece from Chicago after 30 years and plans to marry off her nieces.
cast: Orestis Makris|Georgia Vasileiadou|Jenny Karezi|Gely Mavropoulou|Niki Papadatou|Margarita Papageorgiou|Eleni Zafeiriou|Pantelis Zervos|Stephanos Stratigos|Dimitris Papamichael|Theodoros Dimitriou|Lakis Skellas|Vangelis Ploios|Rallis Angelidis|Kostas Gousgounis|Kostas Papahristos|Vagelis Seilinos
title: I theia apo to Chicago
